settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 1-3 business days to arrive within USA. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 3-7 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: What shipping carriers do you use?
settings.answer: We use all major carriers such as FedEx, UPS, DHL, USPS, and local courier partners. You’ll be asked to select a delivery method during checkout.

settings.title: Can I return my product?
settings.answer: We always aim for make sure our customers love our products, but if you do need to return an order, we’re happy to help. Just email us directly and we’ll take you through the process or you may initiate a return online.

settings.title: Can I get my product customized?
settings.answer: Email us your request and we will get back to you ASAP.

settings.title: How long is the warranty on items on your website?
settings.answer: Warranty on all items are indicated on the product page. If you do not see warranty information, then it's safe to assume it comes with our standard 1 Year warranty

settings.contact_info_text: If we still haven't answered your question, you can contact us below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
